directions: Combine mayonnaise, cilantro, green onion, chipotle chilies and lime juice in small bowl; stir to blend. Season chipotle mayonnaise with salt. Arrange tortillas on work surface. Spread each with half of mayonnaise; top with turkey and lettuce. Roll up tortillas tightly, enclosing filling. Cut each wrap in half.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon minced canned chipotle chilies in adobo
2 romaine lettuce leaves, center rib cut away
title: Turkey Wraps with Chipotle Mayonnaise
